forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. North wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon light casts a gentle glow over Downtown San Francisco, illuminating the city's alluring outline against a backdrop of subtly shifting clouds. With temperatures brimming near 69 degrees yet gracefully easing into the mid-60s, it feels pleasantly mild for a late February day. There is no thick fog to obscure the view; instead, a crisp clarity envelops the city, inviting residents to bask in the outdoors. The north wind whispers softly, offering a cool touch to the air, while the marine layer, now dissipated, hints at evening’s approach when the clouds will deepen and scatter gently.

As night falls, temperatures will slide down to a tranquil 52 degrees, suggesting a light jacket will be your best companion. Today’s charm will be found in a leisurely stroll through the waterfront parks or a cozy café, where one can savor a warm drink while watching the day transition into evening beneath the evolving sky. Gentle moments, like perusing local shops or catching up with friends on a patio, are made all the more delightful in this exquisite weather—a perfect day to relish both the outdoors and the comforts of good company.
